L

Level - Class in com.mygdx.game
This class is responsible for creating levels from the .txt files and putting them in an arraylist.
Level(int) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.Level
Constructor for the level class it reads the .txt file located int he assests folder for the locations of the entities, creates an arraylist for obstacles.
level1ButtonPressed(Vector2) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GUI.LevelSelection
A method that checkes if level 1 button is pressed
level2ButtonPressed(Vector2) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GUI.LevelSelection
A method that checkes if level 2 button is pressed
level3ButtonPressed(Vector2) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GUI.LevelSelection
A method that checkes if level 3 button is pressed
LevelSelection - Class in com.mygdx.game.GUI
A Level Selection class for the user to choose one
LevelSelection() - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.GUI.LevelSelection
A constructor for the level selection
loadLabels() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.SpiderBoiGame
This method prints the labels on the screen.
loadSavedState() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.SpiderBoiGame
This method saves the current state of the game such as the total flyBois or totalknots.
